name: Risk: OAuth Provider Downtime
observations: Description: Google OAuth service unavailable during peak hours
Mitigation: Implement fallback to email/password login
Contingency: Display maintenance message, queue login attempts
DetectionMethod: Health check endpoint every 5 minutes

name: Risk: Database Migration Failure
observations: Description: Schema migration fails during production deployment
Mitigation: Test migration on production clone, backup before deploy
Contingency: Rollback script ready, restore from backup
DetectionMethod: Migration health check, row count verification

name: Risk: Scope Creep
observations: Description: Additional features requested during sprint
Impact: Medium - Sprint goal at risk
Mitigation: Strict change control process, backlog grooming
Contingency: Move low-priority items to next sprint
DetectionMethod: Sprint burndown chart, velocity tracking

name: Risk: Key Person Dependency
observations: Description: Dev A is only person with OAuth expertise
Impact: High - OAuth work stops if Dev A unavailable
Mitigation: Knowledge sharing session, pair programming
DetectionMethod: Daily standup, PTO calendar check

name: Risk: Security Vulnerability
observations: Description: OAuth implementation has security flaw
Impact: Critical - Data breach, compliance violation
Mitigation: Security code review, OWASP checklist, pen test
Contingency: Incident response plan, customer notification process
DetectionMethod: Security scanning in CI/CD, external audit

name: Risk: Performance Degradation
observations: Description: Auth service slows down under load
Mitigation: Load testing, caching strategy, connection pooling
DetectionMethod: APM monitoring, response time alerts

name: Mitigation: OAuth Fallback
observations: Description: Implement email/password as fallback when OAuth unavailable

name: Mitigation: Knowledge Sharing
observations: Description: Dev A conducts 2h OAuth workshop for team
Attendees: Dev B, Dev C, QA Lead

name: Mitigation: Security Review
observations: Description: External security firm reviews OAuth implementation

name: Issue: CORS Configuration
observations: Description: OAuth callback blocked by CORS policy in staging
Resolution: Added OAuth provider domains to CORS whitelist
RootCause: Missing domain in nginx config
PreventiveMeasure: Add CORS check to deployment checklist

name: Issue: Test Data Cleanup
observations: Description: Test users accumulating in staging database
RootCause: No cleanup script after test runs
Impact: Database size growing, search performance degraded
